NAME: Shuangfeng
NOTE: Shuangfeng is a part of the city Loudi (a xian) in Hunan.

NAME: Yingshan
NOTE: It is not clear which Yingshan is meant, as there are many districts which could qualify as the name. Juding from the fact that Yingshan clusters closely with Wuhan, it is likely that it is 英山, east of Wǔhàn.

NAME: Anyi
NOTE: Anyi is a city in the county of Nanchang.

NAME: Hankou
NOTE: Hankou remains a commonly used name for the part of Wuhan urban area north of the Yangtze and Han Rivers. [W] Hankou is the old name for a city that is now part of Wuhan.

NAME: Ningxia
NOTE: Ningxia is a region in China, containing the city Yinchuan.

NAME: Yuci
NOTE: In the map shown in Hamed2006, Yuci is placed close to Yingshan. however, comparing this with other maps, there is no place that could be identified with the name Yuci. I assume that, given that Yuci clusters as Northern dialect, it is much higher up in the North.

NAME: Dancun
NOTE: Yue-Hashimoto on Dancun: «Dancun is a small village lying in the central northern part of Taishan county and situated about thirty li west of Taicheng, while Baishui is within ten li west of it.»
